## ğŸš€ Additional Major Achievements

### **Confluence VS Code Extension** (New Freddie Mac Project)
- **Purpose**: AI-powered Confluence editing directly in VS Code using Markdown
- **Key Features**:
  - Seamless Confluence authoring with native Markdown workflows
  - One-click publishing to push updates straight to Confluence
  - AI-assisted authoring with VS Code Copilot integration
  - AI-powered reviews with inline suggestions
  - Intelligent activity tracking and diagnostics
  - Safe collaboration with version preservation
  - Secure authentication with token management
- **Benefits**: Teams can document faster, keep knowledge current, and deliver polished Confluence pages alongside code
- **Status**: Active development on Freddie Mac project

### **Beemine.ai v0.2.0 Launch** (Product Release)
- **Version**: 0.2.0 released on 2025-09-26
- **New Features**:
  - ğŸ’¬ **Chat**: Persistent sidebar chat experience alongside dashboard
  - ğŸ’¬ **Goal Mentions**: @goal functionality for goal-specific conversations
  - ğŸ“ˆ **Enhanced History**: Rich goal history dialog with add/delete/edit/batch operations
  - ğŸ“¦ **Staged Batching**: Multi-day datapoint workflow for streamlined updates
- **Improvements**:
  - ğŸŒ **Security Clarification**: Updated marketing to clarify server-side AES-256 encryption
  - ğŸ”§ **API Key Usage**: Better explanation of how API keys are used during authorized AI calls
- **Status**: Successfully launched and deployed
